full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): BLO RIGS KYI RNAM GZHAG RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG RGYUN MA CHAD PA BYE GZHUNG KHAS LEN GYI CHA SHAS KYI ZUR 'GA' ZHIG LAGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,('DI LANG RJE BTZUN MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE NYID KYI BKA' MA BCOG PAR MI SHES RUNG BRIS PA'I DAL BA STEN MOD, RGYAL BA YAB SRAS DANG, RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO YAB SRAS DANG, MKHAS GRUB GZHAN GYI GSUNG RAB RNAMS LA GZIGS RTOG MDZAD CING, BSHAD TSUL DKA'I MTSAMS RANG GE YIG CHA 'DZIN TSUL MA 'DRIS PAR MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN YANGS MDA' PA'I TSUL KHUR DU BZHES PA'I RKYEN DU KHAS LEN GYI RGYUN RNA LAM DU GANG BYUNG PHUL NA NYES PA NOR 'KHRUL YOD PA GZHIR ZHOG BDAG PAR MDZAD DU GSOL LO, DKAR CHA CUD YOD NA RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA DANG SKYE BA THAMS CADDU MI 'BRAL BA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
